directions.dialogText: Let's make a simple program that adds two numbers together. We'll start by creating a variable called \`firstNumber\` and giving it a value of \`10\`.

levels.mission: We've already written \`var firstNumber = ;\`. Now you give it a value by typing \`10\` between the \`=\` and the \`;\`.
levels.tips: Your code should look like this: \`var firstNumber = 10;\`

directions.dialogText: Ok! Now let's make another variable called \`secondNumber\` and give it a value of \`4\`. You'll have to do all the typing this time!

levels.mission: Make another variable called \`secondNumber\` and give it a value of \`4\`. If you aren't sure where to start, click on the lightning bolt to the left for Tips.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains the value \`10\`

\`secondNumber\`: contains the value \`4\`
levels.tips: Your second line of code should look like this: \`var secondNumber = 4;\`

directions.dialogText: Now we need to add these two together, but we'll let the computer do the math! Create a third variable called \`sum\` and give it a value of \`firstNumber + secondNumber\`.

levels.mission: Create a third variable called \`sum\` and give it a value of \`firstNumber + secondNumber\`. You must type \`firstNumber + secondNumber\`. You will not pass the level if you just type a number.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains the value \`10\`

\`secondNumber\`: contains the value \`4\`

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber + secondNumber\`
levels.tips: Your third line of code should look like this: \`var sum = firstNumber + secondNumber;\`

directions.dialogText: Great! Now we can have the computer add any numbers we want! Change the values of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` so that \`sum\` will have a value of \`17\`.

levels.mission: Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` new values so that \`sum\` will have a value of \`17\`. Do not change any of the code on line 3!
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number

\`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: Find two numbers that add up to \`17\`. Then give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` each one of those numbers.

quiz.text: Which choice below would create a variable called \`doughnuts\` and give it a value of \`12\`?
Which would make a variable \`fruit\` and give it a value of the sum of \`apples\` and \`oranges\`?
Which choice would give the variable \`number\` a value of \`8\`?

directions.dialogText: This time, we have given \`firstNumber\` a value of \`11\`. We want you to give \`secondNumber\` a value that will make a \`sum\` of \`21\`.

levels.mission: Give \`secondNumber\` a value that will make a \`sum\` of \`21\`. \`firstNumber\` is already set to \`11\`.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: has value of \`11\`

\`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: What do you need to add to 11 to get to 21? Type that number between the \`var secondNumber =\` and the \`;\` on line 2.

directions.dialogText: Good! Let's keep \`secondNumber\` at \`10\` but change \`firstNumber\` to a value that will make a \`sum\` of \`30\`. Remember not to change \`secondNumber\`!

levels.mission: Give \`firstNumber\` a value that will combine with a \`secondNumber\` of \`10\` to make a \`sum\` of \`30\`.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number  \`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: Pick a number and type it after \`var secondNumber =\`. Then, add eight to \`secondNumber\`, and type your answer next to \`var firstNumber =\`.

directions.dialogText: So we can add variables, but we can also SUBTRACT! Let's make a variable called \`difference\` and give it a value of \`firstNumber - secondNumber\`. Keep our other variables with the same values for now.

levels.mission: Make a variable called \`difference\` and give it a value of \`firstNumber - secondNumber\`. Do not change the other variables.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number  \`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`

\`difference\`: contains difference of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: On line 4, type: \`var difference = firstNumber - secondNumber;\`

directions.dialogText: Now for a REAL CHALLENGE!!! Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will create a \`sum\` of \`5\` and a \`difference\` of \`3\`.

levels.mission: Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will create a \`sum\` of \`5\` and a \`difference\` of \`3\`.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number  \`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`

\`difference\`: contains difference of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: No answers this time! Find two numbers that add up to 5 (like 5 + 0 or 3 + 2), but have a difference of 3 (like 5 - 2 or 7 - 4).

directions.dialogText: Well done! Let's make it a little harder. Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will create a \`sum\` of \`10\` and a \`difference\` of \`4\`.

levels.mission: Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will create a \`sum\` of \`10\` and a \`difference\` of \`4\`.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number  \`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`

\`difference\`: contains difference of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: No answers this time! Find two numbers that add up to 10 (like 9 + 1 or 8 + 2), but have a difference of 4 (like 5 - 1 or 8 - 4).

directions.dialogText: Well done! Here's your final challenge. Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will create a \`sum\` of \`20\` and a \`difference\` of \`10\`.

levels.mission: Give \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\` values that will create a \`sum\` of \`20\` and a \`difference\` of \`10\`.
levels.tools:
\`firstNumber\`: contains a number  \`secondNumber\`: contains a number

\`sum\`: contains sum of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`

\`difference\`: contains difference of \`firstNumber\` and \`secondNumber\`
levels.tips: No answers this time! Find two numbers that add up to 20 (like 19 + 1 or 18 + 2), but have a difference of 10 (like 17 - 7 or 13 - 3).
